about_the_game:
Lokaa is a beautiful first-person adventure about Lyra, a woman who travels to a fabled tower in hopes of fulfilling a wish. In your journey, step into the shoes of Lyra, discover charming natural vistas and uncover the secrets deep within the ancient tower.


Key Features:

  • Peaceful music

    Chill out as you explore a mysterious forgotten world

  • Emotional story and lore written by the developer

    Uncover tales from the past and discover secrets more than a century old

  • Explore massive megastructures from an ancient civilisation

    Explore remnants of a lost civilisation, disconnected from the fabric of reality

  • Relatively short experience that you can finish in one sitting

    Grab a coffee!
